Verses: 1 mose Malaiyilirundhu Irangivarath Thaamadhikkiradhai Janangal Kandapodhu, Avargal Aaronidaththil Koottangoodi, Avanai Nokki: Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Engalai Azhaiththukkonduvandha Andha Mosekku Enna Sambaviththadho Ariyom; Aadhalaal Neer Ezhundhu, Engalukku Munsellum Dheyvangalai Engalukkaaga Undupannum Endraargal.
2 adharku Aaron: Ungal Manaivigal Kumaarar Kumaaraththigaludaiya Kaadhugalil Irukkira Ponnanigalaik Kazhatri, Ennidaththil Konduvaarungal Endraan.
3 janangal Ellaarum Thangal Kaadhugalil Irundha Ponnanigalaik Kazhatri, Aaronidaththil Konduvandhaargal.

4 avargal Kaiyilirundhu Avan Andhap Ponnai Vaangi, Sirpakkaruviyinaal Karuppidiththu, Oru Kandrukkuttiyai Vaarppiththaan. Appozhudhu Avargal: Isravelare, Ungalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Azhaiththukkonduvandha Ungal Dheyvangal Ivaigale Endraargal.
5 aaron Adhaip Paarththu, Adharku Munbaaga Oru Balibeedaththaik Katti, Naalaikkuk Karththarukkup Pandigai Endru Koorinaan.
6 marunaal Avargal Adhigaalaiyil Ezhundhu, Sarvaanga Thaganabaligalaiyittu, Samaadhaanabaligalaich Seluththinaargal; Pinbu, Janangal Pusikkavum Kudikkavum Utkaarndhu, Vilaiyaada Ezhundhaargal.
7 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Nee Irangippo; Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Nee Nadaththikkonduvandha Un Janangal Thangalaik Keduththuk Kondaargal.

8 avargalukku Naan Vidhiththa Vazhiyai Avargal Seekkiramaai Vittu Vilakinaargal; Avargal Thangalukku Oru Kandrukkuttiyai Vaarppiththu, Adhaip Panindhukondu, Adharkup Baliyittu: Isravelare, Ungalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Azhaiththukkonduvandha Ungal Dheyvangal Ivaikale Endru Sonnaargal Endraar.
9 pinnum Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Indha Janangalaip Paarththen; Ivarkal Vanangaakkazhuththulla Janangal.
10 aakaiyaal En Kopam Ivarkalmel Moolavum, Naan Ivarkalai Azhiththuppotavum Nee Ennai Vittuvitu; Unnai Oru Periya Jaadhiyaakkuven Endraar.

11 mose Than Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Nokki: Karththaave, Dhevareer Magaa Balaththinaalum Vallamaiyulla Kaiyinaalum Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappadappannina Ummudaiya Janangalukku Virodhamaaga Ummudaiya Kobam Patriyerivadhenna?

12 malaigalil Avargalaik Kondru Podavum, Boomiyinmel Iraadhabadikku Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkavum, Avargalukkuth Theenguseyyumporutte Avargalaip Purappadappanninaar Endru Egipthiyar Solluvaanen? Ummudaiya Kobaththin Ukkiraththai Vittuth Thirumbi, Umadhu Janangalukkuth Theenguseyyaadhabadikku, Avargalmel Paridhaapangollum.

13 umadhu Dhaasaraagiya Aabiragaamaiyum Eesaakkaiyum Isravelaiyum Ninaiththarulum: Ungal Sandhadhiyai Vaanaththu Natchaththirangalaippolap Perugappanni, Naan Sonna Indhath Dhesam Muzhuvadhaiyum Ungal Sandhadhiyaar Endraikkum Sudhandhariththukkollumbadikku, Avargalukkuk Koduppen Endru Ummaikkonde Avargalukku Aanaiyittuch Sonneere Endru Kenjip Piraarththiththaan.
14 appozhudhu Karththar Thamadhu Janangalukkuch Seyya Ninaiththa Theengaich Seyyaadhabadikkup Paridhaapangondaar.

15 pinbu Mose Malaiyilirundhu Iranginaan; Saatchippalagaigal Irandum Avan Kaiyil Irundhadhu; Andhap Palagaigal Irupuramum Ezhudhappattirundhadhu, Avaigal Indhap Pakkaththilum Andhap Pakkaththilum Ezhudhappattirundhadhu.
16 andhap Palagaigal Dhevanaal Seyyappattadhaayum, Avaigalile Padhindha Ezhuththu Dhevanaal Ezhudhappatta Ezhuththumaayirundhadhu.
17 janangal Aaravaaram Pannugiradhai Yosuvaa Kettu, Moseyai Nokki: Paalayaththil Yuththaththin Iraichchal Undaayirukkiradhu Endraan.
18 adharku Mose: Adhu Jeyadhoniyaagiya Saththamum Alla, Apajeyadhoniyaagiya Saththamum Alla; Paadalin Saththam Enakkuk Ketkiradhu Endraan.
19 avan Paalayaththukkuch Sameebiththu, Andhak Kandrukkuttiyaiyum Nadanaththaiyum Kandapodhu, Mose Kobam Moondavanaagi, Than Kaiyile Irundha Palagaigalai Malaiyin Adiyile Erindhu Udaiththuppottu;
20 avargal Undupannina Kandrukkuttiyai Eduththu, Akkiniyil Sutteriththu, Adhaip Podiyaaga Araiththu, Thanneerinmel Thoovi, Adhai Isravel Puththirar Kudikkumbadi Seydhaan.
21 pinbu, Mose Aaronai Nokki: Nee Indha Janangalmel Indhap Perumpaadhagaththaich Sumaththugiradharku, Ivargal Unakku Enna Seydhaargal Endraan.
22 adharku Aaron: En Aandavanukkuk Kobam Moolaadhiruppadhaaga; Idhu Pollaadha Janam Endru Neer Arindhirukkireer.
23 ivargal Ennai Nokki: Engalukku Munsellum Dheyvangalai Engalukku Undupannum; Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Engalai Azhaiththukkonduvandha Andha Mosekku Enna Sambaviththadho Ariyom Endraargal.

24 appozhudhu Naan: Ponnudaimai Udaiyavargal Evargalo Avargal Adhaik Kazhatrith Tharakkadavargal Endren; Avargal Appadiye Seydhaargal; Adhai Akkiniyile Potten, Adhilirundhu Indhak Kandrukkutti Vandhadhu Endraan.
25 janangal Thangal Pagaivarukkul Avamaanappadaththakkadhaaga Aaron Avargalai Nirvaanamaakkiyirundhaan. Avargal Nirvaanamaayirukkiradhai Mose Kandu,

26 paalayaththin Vaasalil Nindru: Karththarudaiya Patchaththil Irukkiravargal Yaar? Avargal Ennidaththil Serakkadavargal Endraan. Appozhudhu Leviyin Puththirar Ellaarum Avanidaththil Koodivandhaargal.

27 avan Avargalai Nokki: Ungalil Ovvoruvanum Than Pattayaththaith Than Araiyile Kattikkondu, Paalayamengum Ullum Purambum Vaasalukku Vaasal Poi, Ovvoruvanum Thanthan Sagodharanaiyum Ovvoruvanum Thanthan Sinegidhanaiyum Ovvoruvanum Thanthan Ayalaanaiyum Kondrupodakkadavan Endru Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
28 leviyin Puththirar Mose Sonnabadiye Seydhaargal; Annaalil Janangalil Erakkuraiya Moovaayiramper Vizhundhaargal.

29 karththar Indraikku Ungalukku Aaseervaadham Alikkumbadi, Indraikku Neengal Avanavan Thanthan Maganukkum Sagodharanukkum Virodhamaayirukkiradhinaal, Karththarukku Ungalaip Piradhishtai Pannungal Endru Mose Solliyirundhaan.
30 marunaalil Mose Janangalai Nokki: Neengal Magaa Periya Paavanseydheergal; Ungalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyakkoodumo Endru Ariya Ippozhudhu Naan Karththaridaththirku Erippogiren Endraan.
31 appadiye Mose Karththaritaththirkuth Thirumbippoi: Aiyo, Indha Janangal Ponninaal Thangalukkuth Dheyvangalai Undaakki, Magaa Periya Paavam Seydhirukkiraargal.
32 aagilum, Dhevareer Avargal Paavaththai Manniththaruluveeraanaal Manniththarulum; Illaavittaal Neer Ezhudhina Ummudaiya Pusthagaththilirundhu En Peraik Kirukkippodum Endraan.
33 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Enakku Virodhamaaip Paavam Seydhavan Evano, Avan Perai En Pusthagaththilirundhu Kirukkippoduven.

34 ippozhudhu Nee Poi, Naan Unakkuch Sonna Idaththukku Janangalai Azhaiththukkondupo; En Thoodhanaanavar Unakkumun Selluvaar; Aagilum, Naan Visaarikkum Naalil Avargaludaiya Paavaththai Avargalidaththil Visaarippen Endraar.
35 aaron Seydha Kandrukkuttiyai Janangal Seyviththadhin Nimiththam Karththar Avargalai Upaadhiththaar.
